You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesP P] > &pscr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Pscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4AB.
  * `&pscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4C5.
